1.title: Pin Up Poses
1.plot: There is a growing trend in boudoir photo shoots. Pin-Up Photography is back with the'all-things-old-are-new-again' wave and the Belles test it out.

2.title: Hamaam
2.plot: In the Muslim world, it's traditional to bathe and cleanse before your wedding day. The Belles head to Hammam Spa to truly discover just exactly what gommage means.

3.title: If the Shoe Fits
3.plot: The Belles head to Lord's shoes to learn about the perfect shoes for a your wedding day.

4.title: Ouch Factor
4.plot: The Belles head to Cutie Pie Wax Bar to be Vajazzled.

5.title: Rent a Dress
5.plot: The Belles learn all about renting everything from party dresses, to bridesmaid dresses to Wedding gowns.

6.title: Grouse Mountain Winter Wedding
6.plot: Sarah Groundwater and Aubrey Arnason searched out the best in all-things wedding planning Sarah's big day last June. Now these wedding pros continue to entertain as they explore the millions of matrimonial possibilities.

7.title: Say Yes to the Tuxedo
7.plot: When it comes to the big day, we can't forget the groom! Aubrey and Sarah head to the Tux Store with their grooms Mark & Brandon to find the perfect tuxedo for their weddings.

8.title: Ideal Protien and Power Plates
8.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

9.title: Riding Off Into the Sunset
9.plot: When you say 'I Do' and are whisked away with your new spouse - there are so many options! The Belles check out Vespas, Fiats, a double decker bus and a Cinderella carriage. How will you ride off into the sunset?

10.title: Randy Fenoli: Say Yes to the Dress
10.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

11.title: Nadia Albano Style Inc.
11.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

12.title: Grooming the Groom
12.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

13.title: Be a Great Emcee
13.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

14.title: Randy Fenoli: Style and Strut
14.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

15.title: Emelle's Catering
15.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

16.title: There's Plenty of Fish
16.plot: Sarah and Aubrey believe that a wedding can be planned with lots of fun, adventure and imagination and aim to inspire their viewers to think outside the matrimonial box.

17.title: Memphis Blues BBQ
17.plot: The Belles head to Eco Dairy farm and enjoy a country inspired wedding theme. Catered by non other than Memphis Blues BBQ.

18.title: Fascinator Shower
18.plot: The Belles hold a fascinator making contest at a bridal shower. Caroline Calvert Couture and Adorn Atelier go head to head. In the end everyone learns there are no winners and losers when it comes to creativity!

19.title: Country Style Wedding
19.plot: With the Calgary Stampede around the corner, the Belles can't help but plan a country inspired wedding

20.title: Cupcake Wars
20.plot: Bridal showers can be a bit dull, so how about an activity to keep everyone entertained from grandma to the flower girl? The Belles bring cupcakes to a whole new level.

21.title: A Love Story
21.plot: The Wedding Belles meet with a top videographer who assures them that capturing the big day on film is worth it.

22.title: Scotch and Some Beer
22.plot: Sarah discovers there is in fact a pink beer and Aubrey discovers what she already knew, she loves scotch.

25.title: A Macaron at Soirette
25.plot: The Belles head to Soirette in downtown Vancouver BC to experience the best in High Tea and Parisian Macarons.

26.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bisou Bridal Style
26.plot: When The Belles go head to head in a 'Say Yes to the Dress' contest Sarah is shocked to learn that poof may not be for everyone. While Aubrey is reminded that her Mom know best when it comes to cousin Jenny's wedding gown.

27.title: Cocoa Nymph Chocolate
27.plot: Sarah and Aubrey head to Cocoa Nymph for a chocolate making lesson.

28.title: Empress Princess for a Day
28.plot: Sarah and Aubrey head to the Empress hotel and get the royal treatment, They enjoy high tea and even get to use the Queen's china.

1.title: So You're Engaged: Now What?
1.plot: Irvine Welsh and Dean Cavanagh's comedy centres on four close friends - Shauna Macdonald, Shirley Henderson, Kathleen McDermott and Michelle Gomez - as they prepare for Gomez's dream wedding From the start, there's violence, very strong language, drug-taking and scenes of a sexual nature which may offend

imdb.plot outline: Sarah Groundwater and Aubrey Arnason searched out the best in all-things wedding planning Sarah's big day last June. Now these wedding pros continue to entertain as they explore the millions of matrimonial possibilities.
imdb.title: The Wedding Belles
plot: Aubrey Arnason and Sarah Groundwater find fun and adventure in all things wedding.::Sarah Groundwater and Aubrey Arnason

Sarah Groundwater and Aubrey Arnason searched out the best in all-things wedding planning Sarah's big day last June. Now these wedding pros continue to entertain as they explore the millions of matrimonial possibilities.::Sarah Groundwater and Aubrey Arnason
